subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As the Knicks’ new president, Phil Jackson will run the team without interference, according to James L. Dolan, the chairman of Madison Square Garden, who said he would “willingly and gratefully” avoid intervening.
snippet: As the Knicks’ new president, Phil Jackson will run the team without interference, according to James L. Dolan, the chairman of Madison Square Garden, who said he would “willingly and gratefully” avoid intervening.
